entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
